overview: From 2026-02-15 to 2026-02-22, elizaos-plugins/plugin-n8n-workflow had 0 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add REST API routes for workflow management
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary
Expose REST API routes from `plugin-n8n-workflow` to enable direct frontend access for workflow CRUD, node catalog browsing, validation, and execution monitoring — without going through the agent NLP pipeline.

This creates a dual-access architecture:
- **Agent access**: NLP → actions (existing)
- **Frontend access**: REST → routes (new)

## Routes Added
### Workflows
- `GET /workflows` - List workflows for a user
- `POST /workflows` - Create workflow with auto credential resolution
- `GET /workflows/:id` - Get workflow details
- `PUT /workflows/:id` - Update existing workflow
- `DELETE /workflows/:id` - Delete workflow
- `POST /workflows/:id/activate` - Activate workflow
- `POST /workflows/:id/deactivate` - Deactivate workflow

### Validation
- `POST /workflows/validate` - Real-time workflow validation (nodes, parameters, inputs)

### Nodes
- `GET /nodes?q=...` - Search node catalog with relevance scoring
- `GET /nodes/available` - Browse categorized catalog (supported/unsupported/utility)
- `GET /nodes/:type` - Get node definition

### Executions
- `GET /executions` - List executions with filters (workflowId, status, limit, cursor)
- `GET /executions/:id` - Get execution details

## Implementation Details
- **Route handlers** delegate to service layer (no business logic in handlers)
- **Credential resolution** via existing `N8nCredentialBridge` (OAuth/API key mapping)
- **Auto-positioning** nodes for workflow creation/updates
- **ElizaOS integration**: Runtime auto-collects `plugin.routes` and prefixes with plugin name

## Changes
- Add route handlers in `src/routes/` (workflows, nodes, validation, executions)
- Export `routes: n8nRoutes` from plugin (auto-collected by ElizaOS runtime)
- Add `listByUser()` to `N8nCredentialStoreApi` for credential mapping
- Add `getWorkflow()` and `listExecutions()` to `N8nWorkflowService`
- Add `getAllNodes()` to catalog utils
- Update mock service helper with new methods

## Tests
✅ **37 unit tests** across 4 files, 78 assertions, all passing:
- `validation.test.ts` - 5 tests (valid/invalid workflows, missing fields)
- `nodes.test.ts` - 8 tests (search, catalog, filtering, 404/400 errors)
- `workflows.test.ts` - 16 tests (full CRUD, activation, validation, missing credentials)
- `executions.test.ts` - 8 tests (list, filters, detail, errors)

## Next Steps
- [ ] Add e2e tests for Next.js catch-all route integration
- [ ] Add retry execution endpoint (`POST /executions/:id/retry`)

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Exposed REST API endpoints for workflow management (create, read, update, delete, activate, and deactivate operations)
  * Added execution listing and detail retrieval endpoints with filtering support
  * Integrated node catalog API with search and availability filtering
  * Added workflow validation endpoint with detailed error reporting

* **Tests**
  * Comprehensive test coverage for all new API routes

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
